titles.title: A bill to limit the royalty on soda ash.
A bill to limit the royalty on soda ash.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 108-702.

bill.summary: Amends the Mineral Leasing Act regarding leases and royalties to provide that the royalty rate applicable to any soda ash lease shall be two percent during the five-year period beginning on the date of enactment of this Act.
